title: Epic Stormtroopers Defense: Star Wars Siege Battle - Bear Force II Mod Gameplay
description:
We are back plating Bear Force 2 a mod for Mount and Blade: Warband.  This time the Rebels have gathered a large force to take out an Empire stronghold defended by Stormtroopers.  Enjoy the Epic Battle :D

Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/star-wars-bear-force-ii

Lionheart's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/lionheartx10

HOW TO JOIN CALL TO ARMS - 
Mount and Blade Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3830559
Call to Arms Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/calltoarmsmountandblade
TS Sever: voice.gameservers.com:9147

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
